author: Rick Coleman
title: Mark Farley Interview
text:
Mark Farley Interview - KWWL - Eastern Iowa Breaking News, Weather, Closings Member Center: Panthers Get the latest news and sports information about the University of Northern Iowa Panthers sports teams, including football, basketball, volleyball, baseball and softball. More >> Get the latest news and sports information about the University of Northern Iowa Panthers sports teams, including football, basketball, volleyball, baseball and softball. More >> 
Rick: UNI is coming off a bye week now going on the road for a couple of tough games at Illinois State and North Dakota State..but anywhere you in this conference its tough. 
Mark: 5 of the the teams in our league are ranked in the top ten... 
Rick: There's really no week off in MVC 
Mark: During our bye week we looked ahead not just to Illinois State and North Dakota State but also Western Illinois that took number one coastal Carolina to the wire.. 
Rick: You are familiar with Illinois State its a good football team. 
Mark: It's a great football team. Very similar to us 
Rick: Trey Roberson and Marshaun Coprich playing well for the Redbirds 
Mark:Yes the runningback was MVFC player of the week and Roberson is dangerous as a runner and passer... 
Rick: Against you in the playoffs He played well.. 
Mark: We beat them in the regular season they beat us in the playoffs. 
Rick Head coach Brock Spack like you is defensive minded.. 
Mark: Yes that is the our League we play great defense 
Rick: Good road win at Cal Poly 
Mark: Yes but we need to play a full 60..this week to win Updated: Thursday, October 1 2015 11:20 PM EDT 2015-10-02 03:20:21 GMT Rick: UNI is coming off a bye week now going on the road for a couple of tough games at Illinois State and North Dakota State..but anywhere you in this conference its tough.Mark: 5 of the the teams in our league are ranked in the top ten...Rick: There's really no week off in MVCMark: During our bye week we looked ahead not just to Illinois State and North Dakota State but also Western Illinois that took number one coastal Carolina to the wire..Rick: You are familiar with Illinois State...
